Text: Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ño̩ mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma ge̩, oñ i fu Defid ke̩che̩ abʼuma ma, i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼabo Israe̩l kpʼabo Juda kaluka.
Tak onu ka ñwu Joab onu ogu-wñ kʼi dʼugbo-wñ le̩, kakini, E̩ nalelo lewa gu ef o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l chaka du, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, kʼe̩ fʼamone̩ le̩ kaluka, kʼomi ku ma aluka amone̩.
Taku Joab ka ñw onu kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi nakʼamone̩ wa manyʼabo-i alu du ku ma de̩, ku ma dʼabe̩le̩ ugbo ogume̩lu; eju odu-mi onu kʼi li ma: ama e̩wñ chi kʼe̩wñ-i nyo̩ odu-mi onu eju ta?
I chaka ka abe̩le̩, o̩la onu fʼe-Joab du, kpai e-amagboji ogu-wñ. Taku Joab kpai amagboji ogu kwo dufu bʼo̩gba onu te̩ ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka.
Taku ma mu Jo̩rdan daba, oñ ma lewa ru Aroe̩r, o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ewo kʼi dʼalumeji o̩go̩ Gad gbogbo wa Jeza.
Oñ ma lewa Gilead kpai ane̩ Tatim-hodshi; oñ ma lewa Dan-jaan, ma la dagbala gbogbo wa Saidon,
oñ ma lewa aku Taya, kpai ewo ewo abo Hifai kpai abo Kenan chaka; oñ ma ledufu tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Juda, ugbo Birshiba.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba ku ma lelo lewa ugbo du ane̩ le̩ kpa, e̩gba kʼochu me̩la nyʼo̩jo̩ ogu jo̩ ma doji wa Je̩rusale̩m.

Taku Joab mʼaluka amone̩ kʼi kaluka le̩ du ñw onu; aboke̩le̩ ku ma nʼuwohi ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo̩ jo̩ ku ma jo̩ Israe̩l che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham; aboke̩le̩ Juda la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩gwa.

Oñ e̩do̩ Defid kpabie̩ abu kʼi fʼamone̩ le̩ kaluka. Taku Defid ka ñwu Jihofa, U fʼadure inaina ta ugbo e̩wñ kʼu che-i, ama fai, O Jihofa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, mʼudu kʼadu-we̩-i fe̩ du tinyo̩; todu u fʼe̩wñ idada che tabale.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid kwane̩ odudu-wñ, o̩la Jihofa lewa ugbo Gad akache̩, kʼi chʼagane̩ Defid, kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ E̩wñ me̩ta nadute̩ ñw e̩: e̩ dʼoka ef uwñ, kʼomi ki chʼe̩.

Abe̩le̩ Gad lewa ugbo Defid, oñ i mudu ka ñw u, i la ka ñw u kakini, O̩kpo̩ta akpa ane̩-we̩-i o̩do̩ mebie? Abe̩k uwe̩ ara rʼo̩gba abo ku ma chʼuwe̩ ope̩cha ku ma nʼuwe̩ ule ochu me̩ta? Abe̩k e̩wñ ibi adʼoj ane̩-we̩-i o̩jo̩ me̩ta? E̩ nafʼu lo, kʼe̩ kpibe ohi kʼu nadu dabiwa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Gad kakini, O̩pe̩cha kʼu dʼef uwñ-i gbe̩: a ki ñwa tef o̩wo̩ Jihofa; todu ejumomi e-wñ tabale; i ki la je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ one̩ n dee.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa je̩ ñw e̩wñ ibi ki lewa bʼIsrae̩l ma akwo odudu gbogbo wʼiko kʼi da ñwu ma le̩; tak amone̩ chane̩ eku akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, aboke̩le̩-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa.

Tak e̩gba kʼonuche̩ O̩jo̩ fʼo̩wo̩ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ Je̩rusale̩m kʼi fu kpabie̩, e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wo̩ Jihofa, oñ i ka ñw onuche̩ kʼi akpa amone̩ bie̩ kakini, I bo̩jo̩ me̩; o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kadʼo̩mo̩ ke. Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ la dʼugbo ajita e-Arauna e̩ne̩ Je̩bius, ugbo ku ma gwʼo̩ka-wñ.

Tak e̩gba kʼi li onuche̩ kʼi akpa amone̩ le̩, Defid ko̩la ñwu Jihofa, oñ i kakini, Go, omi dure, omi la fʼudu-i; i muda chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini-i, e̩wñ ama che ke? Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kobʼomi kpʼabunyi ata-mi.
Taku Gad lewʼugbo Defid o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo, kʼe̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa oj ajita ugwo̩ka e-Arauna, e̩ne̩ Je̩bius, le̩.
Taku Defid te̩gu le teju o̩la ku Gad ka, alu ku Jihofa ñwa le̩.
Tak Arauna nyope go, oñ i li onu kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma fʼeju darʼowñ awa. Tak Arauna ledufu, oñ i dojikane̩ o̩gba onu, eju-wñ la bʼane̩ ma.

Tak Arauna kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi onu wʼugbo adu-wñ-i? Taku Defid kakini, Kʼu fʼajita ugwo̩ka le̩ la ef o̩wo̩-we̩, kʼu fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa, todu e̩wñ ibi le̩ ki we, kʼi kwo bʼamone̩-i te̩.

Tak Arauna ka ñwu Defid kakini, Odu-mi onu ki namʼe̩wñ du ki nyʼowñ eju ko, kʼi mʼu ko che O̩jo̩; go, amokuno̩ tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo jo̩-i, e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ gwʼo̩ka kpai oli uno̩lo̩ amokuno̩ jo̩-i ki chʼiji.
E̩wñ le̩ du, O onu, Arauna ko ñw onu. Arauna laño̩ ka ñw onu, kakini, Uwe̩ ki ru Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ e̩do̩.

Tak onu ka ñw Arauna kakini, O̩da; ela nala ugbo-we̩ alu kʼaja-wñ de̩; u la agba e̩wñ alafa ako chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi n. Abe̩le̩ Defid kʼo̩ko̩ ajifa she̩ke̩l ooje la ajita ugwo̩ka le̩ kpʼamokuno̩-wñ.
Taku Defid fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩wñ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ure̩do̩ wa che. Abe̩le̩ Jihofa mʼologu gba tod ane̩ le̩, oñ e̩wñ ibi la takpa bʼIsrae̩l te̩.
